title: How to Make Cayenne Pepper

steps.headline: Buy the peppers from a store or harvest them from your garden.
Remove the stalks from the chili peppers.
Dry the chili peppers in a slow oven (around 150ºC, or approximately 300ºF) until crisp.
steps.description: Keep a regular watch on their progress so that you will know when they have dried.

steps.headline: Remove from oven and allow to cool completely.
Place in a mortar and pestle with the salt.
steps.description: Pound the chili peppers and salt together until you get a powder.

steps.headline: Store in an airtight container.
steps.description: Use as required, in recipes that call for cayenne pepper.
